content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the lab (position -17.5, 23.5) which requires automation science packs for research.

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups connecting the boiler, steam engine, and offshore pump, facilitating fluid transport.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to gather missing items
- Ensure you have sufficient materials in your inventory before attempting to gather or craft items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that all power-consuming entities (like the lab and steam engine) are connected to a power network to avoid power-related errors.
